_header: Saint Brice when Saint Martin was dead
Subjects: Brice, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Brice (version in short lines)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Brice when saint martin was dedwas ordand bisschop in his stede…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …God len us so here forto lifþat we oure gast to him mai gif
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: De sancto bricis diaconis sancti Martini (rubric, f. 189va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             Altenglische Legenden: Neue Folge.
         Heilbronn: Henninger, 1881: 159-9.
